494583496.name: Extraordinary! Historical! Must see!
494583496.author: a TripAdvisor user
494583496.reviewBody: We went to the Aduana building and museum. The entrance it\'s 1 dollar. To get into the museum.  They show a movie telling the history about independence of Mexico was after Mexican soldiers defeat Spanish soldiers in Tampico.

address.streetAddress: Acceso a La Aduana Maritima Rio Panuco

341070865.name: Historical
341070865.author: a TripAdvisor user
341070865.reviewBody: We took the tour as well as previewed a short film of the Mexican Independence. This was educational as well as a historical experience!

address.streetAddress: Acceso a La Aduana Maritima Rio Panuco

644872910.name: Run, walk or cycle
644872910.author: a TripAdvisor user
644872910.reviewBody: This is a wall that runs 1.5km out to sea. Early in the morning there are people jogging,walking and cycling. There are  raccoons living in the rocks that come out to be fed late afternoon. At the end you can often see dolphins in the mouth of the Panuco river. This New Year\u2019s Day they had the second 3km race with 500 runners. There are some souvenir stalls on the escolleras and shops and food stands at the beginning. You can hire bikes from a couple of places.

577408646.name: Nice place to do some running!
577408646.author: a TripAdvisor user
577408646.reviewBody: The 1.5KM jetty of Miramar Beach is a nice place to do some running because the sea breeze and also you are not going to feel alone due the people that is always walking around.

564472768.name: Las Escolleras (The jetty)
564472768.author: a TripAdvisor user
564472768.reviewBody: This 2.6 Km. long jetty is located right at the south part of Miramar Beach. If you walk on the paved surface you will have on your right the Panuco River mouth onto the sea and on your left the ocean waters of the Gulf of M\u00e9xico. If you stay long enough you might have the chance to sea dolphins or porpoises jumping out of the water, as well as the catch of many fishermen.

539549347.name: Nice walk on the beach
539549347.author: a TripAdvisor user
539549347.reviewBody: The escolleras are what divides the sea from the panuco river. Its a nice walk up to the lighthouse with a spectacular view. There are also Raccoons that you can feed with cat food, they will come up to you and take food from your hand. A must see in the city!

538181363.name: Great time
538181363.author: a TripAdvisor user
538181363.reviewBody: Great time. It is a long walk and I didn\u2019t have sunscreen so I got a sunburn. It\u2019s farther than it looks. It\u2019s a nice walk and the beach is awesome. Recommended.

529272302.name: UNIQUE EXPERIENCE
529272302.author: a TripAdvisor user
529272302.reviewBody: It\u00b4s a unique experience between nature and society. You can walk on a 1.5 km road into the sea to the  lighthouse enjoying the breeze of the ocean, people fishing, walking, biking, dancing, eating tropical fruits or roasted corn, feeding racoons  ships coming and leaving and perhaps watching some dolphin  You may come with Friends, family, couple or alone and will enjoy the spirit of Tampico - Madero

511489926.name: Limited Thing to do
511489926.author: a TripAdvisor user
511489926.reviewBody: We have been here a week and have been looking for something to do, this was one of the best option, which show how few things there are to do in Tampico. We enjoyed the walk, the raccoons. Was interesting watching people fishing, we saw dolphins play a couple hundred yards out. The small gift shops sell the same trinkets as most tourist destinations but the nice part was not being harassed but the vendors as you browse. In certain areas the smell of garbage is the dominant odor but it passes as you move on. You can see how this area was at one time a very busy fun area to visit.

461603007.name: Very nice
461603007.author: a TripAdvisor user
461603007.reviewBody: It\'s a very nice walk along the jetty out to the lighthouse. We went mid afternoon in July and it was HOT. Saw the big ships coming and going and even saw dolphins playing. Just maybe go a little earlier or later in the day and wear sunscreen.

429224177.name: mesmerizing experience
429224177.author: a TripAdvisor user
429224177.reviewBody: you can enjoy how the bluse skies blend with the deep blue sea and the Panuco River. You can live the unique experience of feeding racoons at sunset. Perfect place for running, walking or strolling along the path. At night you can also enjoy a drink and music. Best time to go with kids around 5-7 pm

539550396.name: Not much to see.
539550396.author: a TripAdvisor user
539550396.reviewBody: This is just the canl that connects the carpintero lagoon with the river. There are a few rest stops along the length of the canal bit not much to do, no activities or anything like that. Might be good for a picnic or just a walk.

666027304.name: International Standard
666027304.author: a TripAdvisor user
666027304.reviewBody: You will be pleasantly surprised by this venue.  I hope Tampico can find more interest to host events here.  Located on a wide swath of property, it also includes the Metropolitan Theatre.  Easy access and lots of parking, the expo centre features large conference rooms and plenty of expo space.  AC was good which was important to the exhibitors and attendees.

638938120.name: Cathedral of Tampico
638938120.author: a TripAdvisor user
638938120.reviewBody: If you want to see a different kind of mexican cathedral, you have to visit Cathedral of Tampico in Tampico downtown. The Cathedral of Tampico has italian design, inside the cathedral you can see marble carrara shrine and other interesting thing for seing is the middle way with nazi symbol.

576551394.name: Beautiful and ancient Cathedral.
576551394.author: a TripAdvisor user
576551394.reviewBody: Built in the 1800s and reconstructed after severe problems in the 1900s. It was covered with pink quarry with Corinthian columns and a segmented dome. The beautiful main altar of white Carrara Marble is dedicated to the Immaculate Conception (Virgin Mary).

439660946.name: Loved this Cathedral!
439660946.author: a TripAdvisor user
439660946.reviewBody: It\'s old and beautiful, and if you like that sort of thing, i suggest you visit it for sure. I was there several times, but once I went they were doing mass baptisms and it was truly entertaining. Another time I witnessed a wedding- a great way to soak up happiness, help a couple celebrate their union and observe cultural differences and similarities.

439055511.name: Outside historical, interior too "new"
439055511.author: a TripAdvisor user
439055511.reviewBody: Nice and historical from the outside. The interior is complete renovated and looks too new for such a building. Too freshly painted and the old you have the impression that this is a new church. \'Gone\' is the historical atmosphere.

417743757.name: Moondog
417743757.author: a TripAdvisor user
417743757.reviewBody: If downtown, in the heart of tampico, be sure to visit this cathedral. It\'s on the main square, Plaza, of the city, which is surrounded by hotels, restaurants, bars. It\'s also situated near the historic customs clearing house, the market, and the Wharfedale. Gives you a good half day of sites eyeing. The exterior of the church is under restoration, however it\'s very obvious to appreciate the exterior beauty. Once inside, the interior is captivating, with it\'s statues and murals. This is an experience well worth the time.

357080682.name: Exciting
357080682.author: a TripAdvisor user
357080682.reviewBody: You will get everything for the shopping to buy a gift for your family at affordable prices. The best place of Tampico is Downtown for shopping purpose.

355727130.name: Traditional and obligated visit
355727130.author: a TripAdvisor user
355727130.reviewBody: The catedral is located in downtown of Tampico, is one of the traditional church for the classic time. Is rare to find in a  near city the paints and representations of the catholic images

352432305.name: Makte sure to have a look on the floor
352432305.author: a TripAdvisor user
352432305.reviewBody: Visiting the cathedral for the first time it is a shocking experience to see the whole floor full of spasticas.

341074463.name: Spiritual
341074463.author: a TripAdvisor user
341074463.reviewBody: This is a place to feel the spirituality cultural of Tampico, we were there on the Day of Our Lady of Guadalupe. The whole city is involved in the festivities

323767864.name: Nice place to visit if downtown
323767864.author: a TripAdvisor user
323767864.reviewBody: Like many cities in Mexico, the central square has a cathedral and typically government buildings and restaurants. Tampico is not different. The Cathedral is nice. It was in renovations when I visited, so I was only able to peek inside. It is beautiful inside, but not much different from cathedrals in similar sized cities. The plaza has a large gazebo and plenty of places to sit and enjoy the Tampico heat and watch people. It is an ok destination, but just ok.

288700828.name: I go here regularly
288700828.author: a TripAdvisor user
288700828.reviewBody: The Cathedral and the Plaza are a nice place to go when you want to hang out, see some local sights, maybe have a Torta and just chill out.

644791319.name: Busy for Christmas
644791319.author: a TripAdvisor user
644791319.reviewBody: There are always stalls selling various tourist bits, food and drink and the viewing area to watch crocodiles and terrapins, but Christmas the area was full   There was a small ice rink and Christmas fair. Great fun whizzing over the water on the zip wire.

620566798.name: Ayeeeeeeee
620566798.author: a TripAdvisor user
620566798.reviewBody: This otherwise lovely space has live crocodiles in it. Crocodiles eat humans. This human does not want to be eaten. NOT recommended.

564327894.name: Right in the heart of the city of Tampico visitors can watch totally free wildlife !
564327894.author: a TripAdvisor user
564327894.reviewBody: This 70 Has. lagoon, a few blocks from downtown Tampico is all natural, it has everything: a huge mangrove zone, where all kind of birds and reptiles nest, a walking path from where people can watch wild crocodiles, iguanas, birds and even fish freely sun bathing or flying or swimming around; and also a children\u00b4s playground as well as benches, and a covered area with a soda fountain for relaxing.

551001238.name: Family weekend
551001238.author: a TripAdvisor user
551001238.reviewBody: Sunday activity with the family. This place has restrooms, but you have to pay to use them. When you pay they will give you some toilet paper, but the restrooms are not super clean (there\u2019s graffiti). You can find a lot of vendor with food, ice cream, bracelets, necklaces, and more. Also, there are some rentals like trampoline, bouncy house, train, and more for the kids. In the morning a lot of people go running and there\u2019s a fitness park. Another attraction are the alligators in the lagoon. Is a good Sunday afternoon activity.

539548450.name: Nice walking area
539548450.author: a TripAdvisor user
539548450.reviewBody: This is a grat central park in tampico with lots of activities for families with children, couples and also solo visitors. You can walk around the lagoon, go for un run/jog, see the crocodiles, eat a trolelote, or just enjoy the view and fresh air. Sometimes they have games, fairs and events too. Very recommendable for a leisure day.

538181502.name: Great place
538181502.author: a TripAdvisor user
538181502.reviewBody: I love the laguna. Always see iguanas and gators when I visit. Rides for kids. Shopping. Go on the weekends and a lot of food vendors and things to do. Only downfall is it can be dirty and so not go after a rainstorm it can be flooded. \n\nI just wish people would clean up the trash. Then it would be 100%

480227954.name: By the Conference Centre
480227954.author: a TripAdvisor user
480227954.reviewBody: The pretty lagoon is encircled by jogging and cycling paths and is a nice oasis in the city.  The conference centre looks out onto it.

461600994.name: Fun for the whole family
461600994.author: a TripAdvisor user
461600994.reviewBody: I lived in Tampico for a year with my husband and we would love to go here on the weekends when it\'s more busy. Tons of vendors and food. A little section for fixes for the kids. I never stayed past night as not sure of the area. They have boat rides and a long sidewalk where you can see the alligators (or crocs?) and iguanas and tons of wild life very close. A huge bridge you can walk over the lagoon. Can spend hours here. \nI wish they would stop draining into the lagoon from the houses though that needs to stop.

450046267.name: Too dirty
450046267.author: a TripAdvisor user
450046267.reviewBody: This place used to be such a nice attraction, unfortunately this time around it was very filthy, with the poor aligators swimming amongst garbage. The smell was very unappealing. Too bad the authorities are not investing in this once beautiful place.

436281978.name: Must see place
436281978.author: a TripAdvisor user
436281978.reviewBody: Urbanized all around, has a walking bridge across the lagoon. On one side there\'s a cultural/convention center that includes a small museum about the huasteca culture. On the other side, there\u00b4s a couple of viewing sites for iguanas and...crocodiles, real close.\nBeware of midday heat.

420700509.name: An afternoon walk in the park
420700509.author: a TripAdvisor user
420700509.reviewBody: Big crocodiles, lots of street vendors, great views, a busy spot with lots of activities for the whole family!

375182298.name: One of the most contaminated locations in all of Mexico!
375182298.author: a TripAdvisor user
375182298.reviewBody: This is a highly touted tourist attraction by the city of Tampico, when, in fact, it is one of the most contaminated areas of water, chemical soup, in all of Mexico. Most of the drainage from the streets and sewers of the city is poured into this body of water. That includes, human and animal feces, oil, sludge, heavy metals, etc. Even the illustrated alligators are trying their best to leave this area, hence their discovery in nearby neighborhoods. Until the city cleans up their corrupt practices, and drainage programs, this area should have an "off limits, dangerous to human, and animal life" sign posted on all margins of the laguna. Don\'t go!

353455459.name: Good place to visit, lots of activity for kids on weekend
353455459.author: a TripAdvisor user
353455459.reviewBody: This is a nice place to visit at Tampico, mostly on weekends when there is lots of activity for them. Sunday until noon the street nearby is close to ride bicycles or run.

352432645.name: Amazing experience with Crocodiles and Iguanas
352432645.author: a TripAdvisor user
352432645.reviewBody: Amazing nature where you can see wildlife! Crocodiles and also Iguanas. Nice for a walk on a sunny Sunday!

341070274.name: Amazing Sight
341070274.author: a TripAdvisor user
341070274.reviewBody: This was an amazing sight to see! Very Beautiful at night as well as in the day time. this is a family attraction not to be miised

301683754.name: A Place to enjoy
301683754.author: a TripAdvisor user
301683754.reviewBody: This place is beautiful, there\'s a lot of things to do here, you can take a boat, go to crocodiles observation deck, or maybe just bring your food and make a picnic.

263990079.name: Visited many times and always love it
263990079.author: a TripAdvisor user
263990079.reviewBody: Greqat place to get some peace and quiet even if there are always a ton of people and mainly screaming kids.\nIt is always exciting to see the crocodiles and even though sometimes the smell here is very bad the views and breeze make it worth it.

258967189.name: Family Oriented!
258967189.author: a TripAdvisor user
258967189.reviewBody: What a treat to come here.  There was a section that was fenced in with a mini amusement park. There were street venders selling toys and foods.  There was a clown with a PA system entertaining the kids.  There tons of adults with their family have a great time. Such a joy to see old time traditions still exist.  We went to a different section where there was a fenced area to observe the alligator and birds! Very cool experience!

249369060.name: Nice place.
249369060.author: a TripAdvisor user
249369060.reviewBody: The Laguna del Carpintero is a very nice place to walk at any time.  A lot of police so you feel very safe.

237906286.name: Nasty, contaminated, foul, a disgrace for the image of Tampico.
237906286.author: a TripAdvisor user
237906286.reviewBody: Don\'t waste your time, or money, a drainage receptacle for the entire city, including the city\'s new "showcase", canal de cortidura.

227520728.name: Lots of crocodiles
227520728.author: a TripAdvisor user
227520728.reviewBody: I lived in Tampico for 6 mos as an EFL teacher and found it challenging to find beautiful natural spaces in the City. When I discovered Laguna del Carpintero I was excited. It is basically a long sidewalk next to the lagoon network where you can see crocodiles sunning themselves, iguanas in the trees, and turtles in the water. Make sure to stay on the path as the crocodiles are very close and there are red ant nests. There are families out walking and lots of sweetheart couples. The downside is that there are also sad feral cat populations that are starving and most likely eating the native wildlife. Overall, if you find yourself in Tampico it is definitely a worthwhile place to visit. Make sure to inform yourself about the cartel activity before you go to Tampico.

665983437.name: Good stores - restaurant chains
665983437.author: a TripAdvisor user
665983437.reviewBody: Newest and really ONLY mall in Tampico.  Actually very nice stores with some upscale shopping.  The top floor has a variety of restaurants - mostly chains but a couple of local places.  At least one has live music on the weekends but during the week they all close relatively early.

651337048.name: Certainly the newest place to Hang in Tampico. Shocking to see is forbidden to take pictures!
651337048.author: a TripAdvisor user
651337048.reviewBody: What I still have issues to understand, is why, if this place is probably the second attraction in Tampico, after the beach, it is forbidden to take pictures of the place, but, there is no sign about it, so basically the security people almost jump into the ones who do that....not good

644792415.name: New shopping centre
644792415.author: a TripAdvisor user
644792415.reviewBody: Good place if you love to shop. The centre has two large department stores that each cover the 3 levels. There are restaurants and children\u2019s play areas. The parking area  is a nightmare.

476275178.name: Verry nice place
476275178.author: a TripAdvisor user
476275178.reviewBody: It was about time Tampico had mall like Altama, definitly a nice place to visit, go for a walk, have a great dinner an why not do some shopping

454115807.name: Horrible Parking No Order / Pretty Place
454115807.author: a TripAdvisor user
454115807.reviewBody: Good place to shop and eat but excruciatingly difficult to park and leave. There are absolutely no signs in the parking lot, people park wherever and however they want and security will do nothing about it. The place is beautiful bright and shiny with a good amount of options but once you have to leave, getting out of the parking lot is also much more complicated than it should be.

487130419.name: Out of Business
487130419.author: a TripAdvisor user
487130419.reviewBody: We read good reviews and planned to go on our visit to Tampico.  The park, lagoon and all areas around are very nice, lots of people on their boats or making some activity.  Unfortunately this business is closed to the public and we could not enjoy it.   However the ride to the park and surroundings well worth the try.

address.streetAddress: Fray Andres de Olmos Park, Lake Chairel Bajada San Pedro, Colonia Fray Andres de Olmos

157317609.name: Terrific get away from the humdrum, heat, and, just relax!!
157317609.author: a TripAdvisor user
157317609.reviewBody: If you want to just kick back and enjoy the most beautiful sunsets and moon rises in Tampico, get on down to the Fray Andres del Olmos park, and climb aboard the relaxing floating, two story bar, Suenos Humedos.  This has got to be the most tranquil, safe diversion in the city.  Not only can you enjoy your favorite drinks, and cold beer, but you may also throw your feet up on a chair and enjoy the daily cruises throughout the Chairel lake, while enjoying the beautiful sunset, and watching the assorted wildlife in the lake.  Other boats even pull alongside, and order a drink to go.  The cruises last an hour and a half, and are well worth the 60 pesos fee.  Prices of drinks and beer are very reasonable, and the service is excellent.  We highly recommend this "barquito" as a relaxing place to spend the afternoon, or evening. The bar is open from Thursday to Sunday, from 3:00 pm to 2:00 am each day, except Sunday, closing time is midnight.

address.streetAddress: Fray Andres de Olmos Park, Lake Chairel Bajada San Pedro, Colonia Fray Andres de Olmos

667517723.name: Plaza chiquita con tiendas interesantes
667517723.author: a TripAdvisor user
667517723.reviewBody: Esta es una peque\u00f1a plaza, que cuenta con buenas tiendas como CyA, Nutrisa, Zapater\u00eda Mere etc. Si no te quieres cansar caminando en una gran plaza es una buena opci\u00f3n.

address.streetAddress: Av. Regiomontana s/n Fraccionamiento El Naranjal

652021353.name: excelente plaza comercilas
652021353.author: a TripAdvisor user
652021353.reviewBody: Excelente plaza comercial, lo que buscas lo encentras en ese lugar. locales muy limpios y con seguridad.

address.streetAddress: Av. Regiomontana s/n Fraccionamiento El Naranjal

651896722.name: PLAZA 3 ARCOS...VARIEDAD Y COMODIDAD!!
651896722.author: a TripAdvisor user
651896722.reviewBody:
Si gustas de la rapidez y de la comodidad de realizar las compras de manera ágil, y rápida, no lo dudes más....PLAZA 3 ARCOS es la solución!!  En ella encontrarás diversidad de tiendas desde ropa, calzado, deportes, telefonía, joyerías, moda, juvenil, hasta de nieve, repostería, restaurantes, tecnología, y muchas otras más!!
En un ambiente muy agradable y climatizada, la Plaza 3 Arcos te ofrece lo que buscas en variedad y comodidad...con un amplio estacionamiento y ubicada en la zona dorada de Tampico....si vienes al puerto, no olvides visitar esta plaza que a pesar de estar pequeña en tamaño, es grande en Toda la extensión de la palabra...

Ven y descubre todo lo que te estoy contanto de una vez y vive la experiencia tú mismo!!

saludos.....

MRGF

address.streetAddress: Av. Regiomontana s/n Fraccionamiento El Naranjal

646372711.name: Corte de cabello
646372711.author: a TripAdvisor user
646372711.reviewBody: Acudimos al corte de cabello por que nos gusta mucho como le que queda a nuestro peque, acudimos desde sus primeros cortes

address.streetAddress: Av. Regiomontana s/n Fraccionamiento El Naranjal

643112305.name: Centro comercial
643112305.author: a TripAdvisor user
643112305.reviewBody: Es un centro comercial sencillo, tiene zona de comida (peque\u00f1a) y un \u00e1rea infantil (tambi\u00e9n peque\u00f1a),  lo recomiendo para zapater\u00edas, hay como 5 en la plaza y algunas muy surtidas, tanto para ni\u00f1os como adultos. Los postres de blueberry muy ricos.

address.streetAddress: Av. Regiomontana s/n Fraccionamiento El Naranjal

621396775.name: Centro comercial apto para una tarde de paseo
621396775.author: a TripAdvisor user
621396775.reviewBody: Tiene tiendas con C&E que ponen el marco para iniciar una tarde de compras Adidas , joyer\u00edas y zapater\u00edas  y puedes disfrutar de un delicioso helado natural .

address.streetAddress: Av. Regiomontana s/n Fraccionamiento El Naranjal

612622688.name: Decadencia
612622688.author: a TripAdvisor user
612622688.reviewBody: Ya no es lo que era antes, muy solo y muhas tiendas cerradas actualmente. Desde la llegada de Altama :(

address.streetAddress: Av. Regiomontana s/n Fraccionamiento El Naranjal

604049074.name: Aqu\u00ed hay buenos precios y buenos productos.
604049074.author: a TripAdvisor user
604049074.reviewBody: Manejan precios atractivos para el comprador, es un lugar limpio, seguro, gran variedad de productos, desde ropa interior, zapatos, vestidos de noche, joyas, ropa de diario, ropa deportiva.

address.streetAddress: Av. Regiomontana s/n Fraccionamiento El Naranjal

601926278.name: Centro comercial
601926278.author: a TripAdvisor user
601926278.reviewBody: Es un centro comercial peque\u00f1o pero agradable en el encontraras muchas ofertas de ropa y calzado para toda la familia.

address.streetAddress: Av. Regiomontana s/n Fraccionamiento El Naranjal

599012454.name: Tranquilo y Facil acceso
599012454.author: a TripAdvisor user
599012454.reviewBody: Un lugar tranquilo y de f\u00e1cil acceso para comprar ropa, calzado o simplemente tomar un helado, lo recomiendo bastante para visitar

address.streetAddress: Av. Regiomontana s/n Fraccionamiento El Naranjal

578924332.name: Te roban en el estacionamiento!
578924332.author: a TripAdvisor user
578924332.reviewBody: Me abrieron la camioneta y me robaron mis pertenencias no recomendada la plaza! Lo siento! No volver\u00e9 a ir

address.streetAddress: Av. Regiomontana s/n Fraccionamiento El Naranjal

525445926.name: Plaza amplia y agradable
525445926.author: a TripAdvisor user
525445926.reviewBody: Cuenta con locales comerciales de marcas prestigiadas como C&A, amplio estacionamiento y algunas islas para adquirir suvenirs.

address.streetAddress: Av. Regiomontana s/n Fraccionamiento El Naranjal

604051752.name: Excelente y Divertido!
604051752.author: a TripAdvisor user
604051752.reviewBody: El lugar esta cerrado pero fue un gran lugar para pasar una experiencia diferente con la Familia y los Amigos.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Universidad 601 A Calle 5, Col. Los Pinos

566189006.name: Excelente lugar para divertirse
566189006.author: a TripAdvisor user
566189006.reviewBody: S\u00faper recomendando, un concepto \u00fanico en la zona. Para pasar un muy buen momento con la familia y amigos. El due\u00f1o es muy amable y se preocupa en todo momento de que tengas una grata experiencia.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Universidad 601 A Calle 5, Col. Los Pinos

559304444.name: Excelente concepto de diversi\u00f3n
559304444.author: a TripAdvisor user
559304444.reviewBody: Pasas realmente un momento \u00fanico con familia o amigos. Pones a prueba tus habilidades y emociones. Altamente recomendado.

address.streetAddress: Avenida Universidad 601 A Calle 5, Col. Los Pinos

516455507.name: Diversi\u00f3n \u00daNICA en Tampico
516455507.author: a TripAdvisor user
516455507.reviewBody: Es lo mejor que puedes hacer en Tampico, una experiencia \u00fanica que rebas\u00f3 mis expectativas!! 1000% recomendado

address.streetAddress: Avenida Universidad 601 A Calle 5, Col. Los Pinos
